tools.name: osTicket
tools.purpose: Ticket intake, communication, audit trail, closure.

tools.name: COMP
tools.purpose: Execution system for activations and customer data changes.

processes.name: Intake and triage (email -> ticket)
processes.trigger: Incoming email to support inbox becomes an osTicket ticket.
processes.outcome: Ticket categorized and routed to the correct process owner with next action defined.
processes.description: Common entry point for all requests.

steps.title: Auto assignment to support queue
steps.details: If rules exist, ticket lands in support queue.

steps.title: Support selects correct category
steps.details: Category decision by support agent (example: Salah, Judy).

steps.title: Route to category process
steps.details: Wartungen, Anschaltungen, Kundenmanagement, Standard Stoerung, Passive Stoerung.

processes.name: Wartungen (maintenance)
processes.outcome: Maintenance performed, documented, requester informed, ticket closed.
processes.description: Planned maintenance action with documentation and closure in osTicket.

steps.title: Execute maintenance action
steps.details: Technical work performed by responsible person.

processes.name: Anschaltungen (activation)
processes.outcome: Activation executed in COMP, confirmation documented in osTicket, ticket closed.
processes.description: osTicket for request/comms; COMP for execution.

steps.title: Confirm activation request
steps.details: Validate what needs to be activated.

steps.title: Track COMP progress
steps.details: Keep osTicket updated while work happens in COMP.

steps.title: Confirm completion and close
steps.details: Record COMP reference IDs in osTicket; notify requester; close.

processes.name: Kundenmanagement (customer tasks)
processes.outcome: Customer request answered or implemented; osTicket closed; COMP updated if change required.
processes.description: Two branches: no-change response vs change in COMP.

steps.title: Determine if system change is required
steps.details: No-change: respond and close. Change: proceed to COMP.

steps.title: Document and notify
steps.details: Summarize change and references in osTicket; notify requester.

processes.name: Standard Stoerung (incident)
processes.outcome: Service restored; actions documented; ticket closed.
processes.description: Assign to responsible person, troubleshoot, communicate, close.

steps.title: Confirm resolution and close
steps.details: Customer contact if needed; closure evidence.

processes.name: Passive Stoerung (alert-based incident)
processes.trigger: Monitoring or system email alert creates a ticket.
processes.outcome: Alert validated; remediation done if needed; verification documented; ticket closed.
